about_the_game:
Gun Shop 3 has its sights set on America’s seemingly insatiable appetite for firearms. As the Federally licensed Firearms (FFL) Dealer, you will begin your meteoric rise to the top with humble beginnings of a spare room in your home or a “less than desirable”. Rome wasn’t built in a day, so take a week to use this time to get a handle on the do’s-and-don’ts of the FFL world.



Design
Life starts now. You’re going to need storage space and safes to securely store your merchandise. As you grow, you will also need to fill your palace of profit with the furnishings needed to conduct your business and appeal to the masses.



Upgrade
As you grow, so can your gun shop! You will have certain additions or enhancements available for purchase as you gain knowledge and experience running your business. Need more space to store your inventory, or how about retail space in general? Depending on your location, you might just be a stack of cash away from expanding your location. Looking to spice things up a little bit? The world is your oyster. You might be in a location where you can add-in your very own firing range? That leads into the next phase.

Expand
Tired of living in the shadow of a billboard advertising some male surgical procedure, or perhaps your store is bursting at the seams? Contact a real estate agent and move on to greener pastures. Not all locations are created equal, and come with their own Pros-and-Cons. Balance your budget with your intentions and find a new location so your firearms fiesta can continue to grow and expand.

Special Events
If there’s one thing that screams satisfaction to a prospective purchaser, it’s hosting some sort of mega event where they can part with their cash as conveniently as possible. That’s where the gun show comes in. Not quite the superstar you’d hope to be? This event will be your force-multiplier. Rent a booth and pack your van to the brim. These people are out in force and ready to buy, but only for a limited time! Not quite ready to host your own booth? You can also go to these events to purchase things cheap or find some underappreciated gems to sell back at your shop.



Restore
Second hand merchandise will likely need some TLC to get into shape to be sold in your store. Use your workbench to clean, revive, and even spruce up your wares to be nice and attractive for your customers.

short_description: Do you like guns? Many people sure do! Gun Shop 3 is a real-time storefront simulator with a sprinkling of first person shooter mechanics on top. Choose your location, design your store, stock the shelves, and then flip that sign to “open for business”! The demand is there. Can you supply it?
